alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 09 at 1:55PM PST until March 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 1 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Humboldt County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 10 AM Friday to 1 AM PST Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles along east to west routes. Blowing snow possible on higher passes.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.
